name: Pixel BoomBot 10 Seconds
description:
Pixel BoomBot 10 Seconds is a fast typing game, where you must complete each level in 10 seconds.

In order to complete a level, you must grab every dot in the area. and return back to the main spot where you started. If 10 seconds pass, or you fall off the area, you fail and you'll be forced to restart.

* The game is not finished, or not planned to be finished due to me losing the project in a hard drive accident.
